Description:
Modern family home
A free flowing design built by Mega homes of Melbourne this spacious four bedroom family home would suit the large family on a budget or the astute investor looking for excellent rental returns & tax depreciation.
Open plan kitchen, tiled dining & carpeted living. The living area offer direct access to the spacious backyard.
The kitchen is spacious with plenty of bench space & a wall pantry.
Master bedroom with spacious ensuite & walk in robe.
Just a short drive to the new Curlewis shopping centre.

Description:
Don't Build! Buy Me
Whether you are looking to start out, downsize or invest then look no further than this immaculately presented home. With nothing left to do now is the time to make the move to the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula and enjoy all this fantastic location has to offer. Included are 4 generous bedrooms, master includes WIR plus ensuite while the remaining bedrooms all benefit from BIR's and are serviced by the family bathroom. Spend time relaxing in the formal sitting room while for the family gatherings enjoy the space of the open plan kitchen/dining/family living that flows effortlessly out to the stylish alfresco area. With two stylish outdoor spaces to choose from either relax undercover or enjoy the warmth of the sun in the beautifully decked outdoor living spaces making entertaining your friends and family a breeze. With extras such as stone bench tops, central heating and cooling, double remote garage with internal access, fully landscaped gardens and all within walking distance of the new Curlewis shopping centre and a short drive to Clifton Springs boat ramp, golf course plus Drysdale township. This is not just a home you are buying but a lifestyle and an inspection is highly recommended!

Description:
Quality & Space by the Bay
Presenting the perfect family residence that is still like new combined with that sought after coastal lifestyle. Immaculately maintained and smartly positioned on a 512m2 parcel of land with a North facing backyard. Featuring 3 generous bedrooms, the master with ensuite & WIR. A formal lounge as you enter will allow for those peaceful retreats. Step through to the quality kitchen with WIP overlooking the large open plan family living and meals area, all capturing fantastic natural light. You will flow effortlessly out from here onto a huge entertaining deck complemented by the built in alfresco and big backyard for the kids, the perfect place to enjoy those summer months ahead. Includes DLUG, ducting heating, split system A/C, high ceilings and fully landscaped gardens. Positioned amongst other quality properties and less than 500 meters from the new Curlewis Shopping Centre and local park complete with a playground. Enjoy being only a short drive to Clifton Springs bay, Golf course and the township of Drysdale. This simply is a must see property if you want to secure your family's future.

Description:
Modern, Stylish Living - Why Build?
There is simply no need to build when you can secure this perfectly presented and immaculately maintained property combined with that ever sought after coastal lifestyle. Still like new and spacious throughout, this home is ideally suited to first homebuyers and downsizers. Positioned amongst quality properties and just a short walk to the Curlewis shopping centre. Featuring 3 large bedrooms with BIR's, grand style master retreat complete with a window seat, ensuite and WIR. This flexible floor plan boasts the luxury of two separate living zones. Formal lounge as you enter, through to the light filled open plan living and meals area. All overlooked by the stylish kitchen with quality finishing's. Step outside via two separate sliding doors onto the private deck with a pergola and built-in bench seat, perfect for entertaining during those summer months ahead. Includes DLUG, ducting heating, ample yard space and fully landscaped. Situated within walking distance to local parks and Drysdale Reserve and only a short drive to Clifton Springs bay, Golf course and the township of Drysdale. This simply is a must see property if you appreciate style, space and quality.

Description:
Immaculate 4-BR home with designer flare!
Set in a vibrant neighbourhood rich with green spaces and convenience, this immaculate near new home is presented with designer flare and will turn heads! Complete with 4 bedrooms, 2 living zones in a fantastic growth area, it marks the end of the search for a dream home for one lucky family or astute investor!
Thrifty and family-orientated features stand this home out from the rest. The soft neutral tones of the decor is integral to the contemporary look. Hardwearing floor tiles are easy-care and meld beautifully with white paint tones, maximising space and liveability. The monochromatic wet areas and kitchen are presented 'as-new'.
Clean sharp lines are on trend in the living hub. Proportioned for family togetherness this space encourages a healthy indoor-outdoor lifestyle. The sleek kitchen, with large pantry, overlooks living and dining and boasts vision further afield to a private entertaining area in the backyard with timber decking. Chefs and mums alike will enjoy the 900mm electric oven with gas cooktop, range hood and dishwasher. The long stone breakfast bar is a natural gathering place for the family and guests.
The parent's quarters at the façade are graced with lovely natural light and include a large bedroom, walkthrough robe and stylish en suite. At the rear, the minor bedroom wing boasts 3 spacious bedrooms with built-in robes, a fashionable family bathroom with bath and shower, separate toilet and light-filled laundry.
Climate is controlled with ducted gas heating throughout and reverse cycle air conditioning in the living hub.
The yard is low maintenance, secure and tidy finished with a beautiful timber deck, secure and ideal for the little ones and pets. The DLUG has internal and backyard accesses and 2 off street parks in front.
In this safe location, walking distance to major shopping centres and public transport, your family will thrive! 15 minutes to the Geelong CBD and 5 minutes to the Bay Beaches. View without delay!
- Immaculate 4-BR family home with designer flare in an estate rich with green spaces
- Open plan indoor-outdoor living, 2 living areas
- DLUG and secure backyard ideal for the little ones and pets
- Master with en suite and WIR plus a separate 3BR wing with family amenities
- Ducted gas heating and reverse cycle AC
- Close to school, shops and public transport, and set between the city and the beach!
Land: 400 sq m approx.

Description:
Coriyule Stage 2 - 525m2
No frustrating restrictions. The Coriyule Estate Drysdale is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that Drysdale has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also right on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. Our estate gives you the freedom to create without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates. The National Broadband Network (NBN) is in the Coriyule Estate to provide you with highest quality internet experience. The deposit of only $5,000 is kept low to help you get into the market. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
WHY BUILD? - your next home is already here!!!
With a 6 star energy rating and situated in the highly sought “Curlewis Parks Estate” this property offers everything the family needs, and comprises 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living areas, open plan kitchen dining, alfresco entertaining, 2 car garage, manicured landscapes and more.
Curlewis offers a short trip to a number of the peninsulas best attractions, including a number of quality golf courses, award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington peninsula.
At the heart of the home the spacious designer kitchen gives the chef of the home full view of ALL living spaces and boasts stone tops, walk in pantry, 900mmS/S appliances and dishwasher.
The master bedroom found at the front of the home is a generous size and includes walk in wardrobe and full ensuite, whilst a further 3 bedrooms are at the other end of the home accessed via a passage off the main living area and all have built in robes.
Outside an under roof alfresco entertaining area, open to the North and East, is surrounded by manicured landscapes and the finest grass this side of Curlewis golf course.
Additional features consist of: double glazed windows, gas ducted heating, air conditioning, stone tops, solar panels, remote garage and more.
Dion Plumb : 0424 940 629
Insights: 78 Anstead Avenue, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
SIZE DOES MATTER!!
PRICE REDUCTION!!!!!.......Extremely rare opportunity to secure a BIG vacant block of land within an exclusive estate!
This block of land ticks all the boxes for the most fussiest of buyers. Approximately 740m2 (16.5m x 44.8m) of prime real estate surrounded by quality built homes and beautiful parklands. Curlewis Parks offers all the benefits of the coastal lifestyle yet is only 17km from the Geelong CBD and close proximity to some great beaches, local wineries, Clifton Springs boat ramp and the Bellarine Rail Trail. Landscaped grasslands and architecturally designed parks compliment a convenient central location.
Secure this block and start living the dream!!!

Description:
Near New Home with Awesome Shed!
Neatly located on a good size block in a well-established street, this immaculate home is packed full of extras.
• 3 extra large bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe
• Spacious second living area, plus study or optional 4th bedroom
• Open plan kitchen/dining/living, all north facing out to paved and private alfresco
• Double remote garage with through access to impressive 6m x 6m “man cave”- ideal for tradie or mechanic
• Other extras include: High ceilings, large cornices, evaporative cooling and ducted heating. Also fibre optic connection for internet, TV and Foxtel (i.e. no aerial or dish necessary)
This welcoming home is a cut above the rest and is well worth a look, call now to inspect. Floor plan available upon request.

Description:
Vendor says SELL !
Located in ever popular Curlewis, this property is simply stunning in execution with gorgeous landscaping. Conveniently located twenty minutes from Geelong's Central Business District, minutes to the Clifton Springs Bay, the Golf Course, Drysdale Reserve, and a short drive into the township of Drysdale, makes this residence a lifestyle standout.
Upon entry this residence is stunning! The study greets viewers to the right and the master bedroom to the left. The master features a luxurious en suite with double vanity, shower and large walk in robe. Moving forward is a second living area, or fifth bedroom with a large walk in linen press or wardrobe and would suit as a cinema room. This is adjacent to the spacious laundry, with a wall to floor linen press. Internal access from the remote controlled double lock up garage is located in this sector of the residence, the double garage provides access into the rear yard via a single roller door.
The tiled entrance flows in to an open plan and spacious living area appointed with a designer quality kitchen. With floating stone bench tops, a stunning designer tiled splash back, stainless steel appliances accompanying an extra-large walk in pantry that enhances the large amount of storage in this contemporary home. With a warm and homely feel this zone is ideal for the ever growing family or fine entertaining experiences amongst family and friends.
The family dining and living overlooks the undercover entertaining zone with a grassed and securely fenced rear yard incorporating a rain water tank. To the left of the family room lies the bedroom quarters nestled among the generous bathroom, comprising bath, shower, vanity and separate toilet. All three bedrooms are spacious in size and feature built in robes.
The property is warmed over the cooler months with ducted heating and kept light and bright with LED lighting, light filled windows and an uplifting colour palate. This home has an abundance of storage throughout and offers the astute purchaser a flexible home with numerous living options. Do not linger, this property is priced to sell and ready for you to call it home. An inspection is a must.

Description:
The Builder's Own Home
This brilliantly designed and meticulously finished product will appeal to those looking for a new quality home without the hassles. With proven results, this quality boutique builder is presenting to market his own personal property, being a 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, formal lounge, informal open plan kitchen family room, alfresco living, double garage with drive through, garden shed, landscaped surrounds in a developed pocket of new Curlewis opposite Ashworth Park. Timber flooring, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, stone kitchen bench tops, spacious walk in pantry and dedicated storage room, this property will meet the requirements of the most fastidious purchaser.

Description:
Time to make the lifestyle change you want
Set on approx 5 acres, this property will provide a lovely lifestyle change. Located just 15 minutes from Geelong and only a few minutes to Drysdale and Portarlington this comfortable home not only boasts convenient location but also offers serene views. Featuring 4 bedrooms, the main with ensuite/WIR, a study/sewing room, a family bathroom services the 3 minor bedrooms, a cosy kitchen and meals area, lounge room with stunning views across your property and beyond and a second sitting room with gas log fire. With power, mains water and bottled gas, all your services are available.
Outside lies endless opportunities with a beautiful vista providing the perfect back drop to outdoor living. A well used tennis court provides an alternate area for children to play basketball, ride bikes and with some TLC could be the practice court for the next world champion! The double carport offers undercover accommodation, plus a small shed. Plenty of established trees provide privacy and shade. Add your touch to the home & garden and make it your dream lifestyle property.
Situated literally next door to the fabulous Curlewis golf course and close to the Drysdale school precinct and only 3kms from the town centre, this is the complete affordable package.
